sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const A5 = () => { const [comments, setComments] = useState([]); const [userPhotoBase64, setUserPhoto] = useState(localStorage.getItem('userPhotoBase64') || null); const [userName, setUserName] = useState(localStorage.getItem('userName') || 'Your Name'); useEffect(() => { // Load comments from local storage specific to this page const storedComments = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('commentsA5')) || []; setComments(storedComments); }, []); // This effect runs only once when the component mounts const handleFormSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const comment = event.target.elements.comment.value; const newComment = { author: userName, timestamp: new Date().toLocaleString(), content: comment, photo: userPhotoBase64, }; const updatedComments = [...comments, newComment]; setComments(updatedComments); event.target.reset(); // Save comments to local storage specific to this page localStorage.setItem('commentsA5', JSON.stringify(updatedComments)); }; const [showDropdown, setShowDropdown] = useState(true); const handleMenuToggle = () => { setShowDropdown(!showDropdown); }; useEffect(() => { const handleResize = () => { if (window.innerWidth >= 1280 && window.innerHeight >= 1900) { setShowDropdown(true); } else { setShowDropdown(false); } }; window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize); handleResize(); return () => { window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize); }; }, []); return (
  • Homepage

  • Contact

)}

Home Reviews and rating

Shiratorizawa Gakuen Koukou

シラトリザワ ガクエン コウコウ

Shiratorizawa Gakuen Koukou" is a sports anime that focuses on high school volleyball the story revolves around Shiratorizawa Academy, a prestigious school known for its powerful and dominant volleyball team. The main protagonist is Hinata Shoyo, a determined and energetic player who dreams of becoming a top volleyball player despite his short stature.

  • Type: TV Series
  • Studios: Lerche
  • Date aired: Oct 02, 2019 to ?
  • Status: Airing
  • Genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Magic
  • Scores: 7.31 / 1,515
  • Rating: 8.5 / 161 times
  • Duration: 24 min/ep
  • Quality: HD
  • Views: 131,541
